LanguageData.WG_StructurePoint.Tooltip: The overall structure point of an Exosuit, which negates damage effects on hits to protect Exosuit pilot. But if it is lower than 25%, there is a 25% chance of penetrating the outer armor and causing damage to pilot. Once the structure value drops to zero, the Exosuit will completely disabled and trap its pilot in the destroyed wreckage. \n\nTo restore structural points, the Exosuit needs to be docked at a maintenance gantry. Colonists with crafting capabilities will be able to repair damaged core frame and sub-modules.
